input:
Write an ad for the following product

Product: LangLang is an app that connects you to language teachers across the world.

Tone: informative, friendly

Audience: college students
sentences: Looking to learn a new language? LangLang is the perfect app for you! With teachers from all over the world, you're sure to find the perfect teacher for you.
Looking to learn a new language? LangLang is the perfect app for you! With teachers from all over the world, you can learn any language you want!
Looking to learn a new language? LangLang is the perfect app for you! With teachers from all over the world, you'll be able to learn the language of your choice in no time.
